3.1.name: wordpress/all-sports-widget
3.1.description: Imagine all of the Best Sports sites from around the internet aggregated into one place, a widget you can easily embed into your website or as a Wordpress Plugin. Well you can stop wishing, The Sports Bank has put together an aggregation of the Webs Best Sports Content (NBA NFL NHL MLB ETC) ready to easily display on your website. Adding this widget to your website will allow you to display the web's best football and baseball content on the internet! Do you own a great sports website? Request that we add your headlines here --> http://www.thesportsbank.net/nba/add-the-new-sports-bank-stories-widget-plug-in-get-your-feed-added/
